summary: Comprehensive testing of liquor sales analysis dashboard completed. Backend APIs are 92.3% functional with one minor error handling issue. Frontend is fully functional with all key features working: file upload UI, configurable overstock multiplier (3x rule), sales trend visualization, overstocking alerts, and brand performance ranking. Dashboard displays real data (5 brands, ₹11,50,000 total stock value) with proper formatting and responsive design.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 500 status code instead of 400 when invalid file type is uploaded
minor_bugs.impact: Poor error handling - should return proper validation error
minor_bugs.expected_behavior: Should return 400 status with proper error message for invalid file types

minor_observations.issue: File input is hidden by design (triggered by label click)
minor_observations.impact: No functional impact - this is expected behavior

minor_observations.issue: One test case showed inconsistent count change (2.0x to 3x), but 3x to 4x worked correctly
minor_observations.impact: Possible edge case in multiplier calculation

passed_tests: File upload with valid Excel data (5 records uploaded)
Analytics endpoint with multiple multiplier values (2.0, 2.5, 3.0, 4.0, 5.0)
Multiplier logic validation (lower multipliers = more overstocked items)
Brands endpoint returning all brand data
All 4 key metrics cards displaying correct data
Tab navigation (Sales Trends, Overstocking Alerts, Brand Performance)
Sales trends showing 7 daily entries with proper formatting
Overstocking alerts showing 3 items with detailed breakdown
Brand performance ranking showing top 5 brands
Overstock multiplier configuration and real-time updates
Currency formatting (₹ symbol with Indian number format)
UI design elements (gradient background, cards, icons, buttons)
action_item_for_E1: Fix minor backend error handling: /api/upload-data should return 400 status code (not 500) when invalid file types are uploaded. Add proper validation error response for unsupported file formats.
